Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
14.08.2012 JH SCR17500 Replaced activation of Excel via UFB577 with GB323 - ActivateExcel
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
05.12.2011 GB SCR16871 Change the screen to 1024*768 and made column manual text wider
30.09.2011 GB SCR16685 Changed mask of invoice number (10 -> 20)
25.03.2011 SH SCR16300 Added button Remark
22.09.2008 GB SCR13955 Display Batch number in blue if BTCH_CODETYPEACCOUNT = 5
13.03.2008 SH SCR13449 Replaced windowmanger stuff by new GB100 programs
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Removed GM100 (window manager handling) done by FLWM prog.
15.05.2007 SH SCR12524 Added new BTPC variables (top of screen)
12.07.2006 SH SCR11565 Added BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENTon screen
12.01.2006 SH SCR10102 Fixed bug with table CODE (wrong index was used and
changed table to be read only)
07.11.2005 SH SCR9431 Added text viewer for BDPD descriptions, will be actiavted
only if PI.OPENTEXTVIEWER = TRUE (new parameter)
on 9.9.2005 WJ SCR9048 extend message
on 8.9.2005 WJ SCR9023 extend batch date
on 3.8.2005 WJ SCR8734 code_description as tooltip
05.11.2004 JJ SCR7292 Added excel handling
//04-05-2004 JP request DD: resize table caption fields ( were to small )
21.04.04 MW SCR6032 --> extended the screen with BPIV_INVDATE
03.02.2004 MW SCR #5181 Implement the Print Button and a new Button
"Letters" in Task "Handled", that activate a new screen.
10.09.2003 EE SCR4325 add new field to sreen (table)
08.09.2003 EE SCR4294 Add new fields to screen
25.04.2003 SH SCR3409 Implemented call to GM101 if button Cashreport pressed
24.03.2003 RR -> SCR3195 Implementation of shortcut handling
11.12.2002 SH SCR2674 Add new column "Debtor Heller" (= BTPC_DEBH)
04.07.2002 SH If OPH202E was called from OPH202A or OPH202B all BPIV rows
- will be dispalyed, then PI.BTCP_LINNUM = 0
27.05.2002 SH SCR1321 Do not display BPIV rows with BPIV_BTCH_ID = 1, give
- message "Specification not available" if PI.BTCH_ID = 1
01-FEB-2002 AS, disabled debug screen
-- only relevant for Locate after looking Cash report
-- Uses for text viewer and window manager handling
-- Shortcut labels
-- Init path/file for text viewer
-- Shortcut handling
-- BPIV rows with BPIV_BTCH_ID = 1 will not be dispayed, because they are
-- million of BPIV rows for this BTCH_ID
-- If PI.BTCH_ID = 1, the specification is not avaliable
-- No payments exist for dispaly
-- TOTALS
-- Open text viewer with payment descriptions
-- Update v.BTCP_BADP_ID to achieve a re-compute on BLHS after coming back from
OPH113, to show the red retangle around button "Remark"
****** Insert by Wenta (SCR #5181) ******
-- Cancel ='C'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (18,2)) FROM :1 WHERE BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 :3
